USA TODAY Billboard named Ariana Grande the 2018 Woman of the Year. ( Photo : Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello / Invision / AP ) Ariana Grande may have spoken too soon when she sang about having no tears left to cry. On Wednesday night, Grande tweeted a joke about the lyrics of her single, suggesting that its wisdom may have been premature. ` ` Remember when I was like hey I have no tears left to cry and the universe was like HAAAAAAAAA ( expletive ) u thought,'' she wrote on Twitter.
